1: <pb/>Axo ix Raquel chi' ix pitzvichaan̈ ajc'olal d'a spensar ix, ix och ix ajc'olal d'a ix Lea chi' yujto malaj yune' ix, ix yalan ix d'a vin̈ yetb'eyum chi' icha tic: <pb/>—Ac' vune'. Tato maay, tic tzin chami, xchi ix.
2: <pb/>Yuj chi' ix cot yoval vin̈aj Jacob, ix yalan vin̈ d'a ix icha tic: <pb/>—¿Tocval Dios in? A Dios chi' max ac'anlaj une' chi', xchi vin̈.
3: Ix yalanxi ix d'a vin̈: <pb/>—Vayan̈ yed' ix in criada Bilha, ayic ol aljoc yune' ix chi', icha val vune' ol ajoc, xchi ix.
4: <pb/>Ix yac'an ix scriada ix chi' d'a vin̈, ix yic'lan sb'a vin̈ yed' ix.
5: Axo ix alji jun yune' ix Bilha chi',
6: ix yalan ix Raquel icha tic: Dan ol sb'iej vin̈ unin tic, yujto ix yab' in lesal Dios, ix in sch'olb'itani, yuj chi' ix yac' jun unin tic d'ayin, xchi ix.
7: <pb/>Ix lajvi chi', ix alji junxo yune' ix Bilha yed' vin̈aj Jacob chi'.
8: Ix yalanxi ix Raquel chi': A jun unin tic Neftalí ol sb'iej, yujto ix in telaj in b'a yed' ix in nulej ix Lea, axo ticnaic ix can ix yalan̈ vuuj, xchi ix.
9: <pb/>Axo yic ix yilan ix Lea to man̈xalaj yune' ix, ix yac'anpax ix scriada ix, aton ix Zilpa d'a vin̈aj Jacob chi'.
10: Ix alji jun yune' ix yed' vin̈.
11: —Vach' vico' yuj chi' Gad svac' sb'iej vin̈ unin tic, xchi ix Lea chi'.
12: <pb/>Ix lajvi chi', ix alji junxo yune' ix Zilpa chi' yed' vin̈aj Jacob chi'.
13: Ix yalanpax ix Lea chi' icha tic: Te tzalajc'olal vico', axo eb' ix vetixal ol alanoc to ay in tzalajc'olal, yuj chi' Aser ol sb'iej vin̈ unin tic, xchi ix.
14: <pb/>Ay jun c'u ix b'at vin̈aj Rubén b'eyelec' d'a caltac te', ayic van sjochchaj ixim trigo. Ata' ix ilchaj juntzan̈ sat an̈c'ultac yuj vin̈ to sloji, mandrágora sb'i. Ix yic'anb'at an̈ vin̈ d'a ix Lea, aton ix snun vin̈. Axo yic ix yilan an̈ ix Raquel chi', ix yalan ix d'a ix Lea icha tic: <pb/>—Tzin tevi d'ayach to tzac' junoc an̈ mandrágora ix yic'cot vin̈ une' chi' d'ayin, xchi ix.
15: <pb/>Ix yalan ix Lea chi' icha tic d'a ix: <pb/>—¿Tom man̈ c'ocb'iloc ix iq'uec' vin̈ vetb'eyum, axo ticnaic, snib'ej a c'ol tza c'anec' an̈ mandrágora ix yic'cot vin̈ vune' tic? xchi ix. <pb/>—Ac' an̈ d'ayin, tato icha chi' syal svay vin̈aj Jacob ed'oc d'a jun ac'val tic, xchi ix Raquel chi'.
16: <pb/>Axo yic van sq'uic'b'i ix jax vin̈aj Jacob d'a smunlajel, ix b'at ix Lea schacot vin̈, ix yalan ix d'a vin̈ icha tic: <pb/>—A ticnaic ol ach vay ved'oc, d'a val yel ix vac' an̈ mandrágora ix yic'cot vin̈ vune' d'a ix in nulej ix Raquel a tojoloc, xchi ix. <pb/>Yuj chi' ix vay vin̈aj Jacob chi' yed' ix d'a jun ac'val chi'.
17: A Dios ix ab'an slesal ix, yuj chi' ix alji junxo yune' ix yed' vin̈, yoil uninxo.
18: Ix yalan ix: Isacar ol sb'iej vin̈ unin tic, yujto ix spactzitej Dios d'ayin, yujto ix vac' ix in criada d'a vin̈ vetb'eyum, xchi ix.
19: <pb/>Ix lajvi chi', ix alji junxo yune' ix yed' vin̈aj Jacob chi', aton svaquil unin eb'.
20: Ix yalan ix: Ix yac' Dios jun silab' man̈xo jantacoc svach'il d'ayin, yuj chi' ol in sxajanej vin̈ vetb'eyum tic. Svaquilxo jun unin tic svil yed' vin̈, yuj chi' Zabulón ol sb'iej, xchi ix.
21: Yicxo slajvub'al ix yilan sat jun ix unin ix, Dina ix yac' ix sb'iej.
22: <pb/>Axo ix Raquel chi', ix nachajcot ix yuj Dios, ix ab'ji slesal ix yuuj, ix javi yune' ix.
23: Ayic ix alji jun sb'ab'el unin ix, ix yalan ix: A in q'uixvelal, toxo ix yiq'uel Jehová, yujto toxo ix yac' jun vune' tic.
24: Tzoc val el d'a sc'ool syac'pax junocxo vune', xchi ix. Yuj chi' José ix sb'iej jun unin chi' yuj ix.
25: <pb/>Ayic toxo ix alji vin̈aj José, ix yalan vin̈aj Jacob d'a vin̈aj Labán icha tic: <pb/>—A ticnaic, cha in pax d'a in chon̈ab'.
26: Ac' eb' vuninal yed' eb' ix vetb'eyum, c'ocb'ilocxob' in cajan eb' ix d'ayach, smojxo val tzin paxi. Ojtac val tas ix aj in munlaj d'ayach, xchi vin̈.
27: <pb/>Axo ix yalan vin̈aj Labán chi' d'a vin̈ icha tic: <pb/>—Maay, tzin tevi d'ayach to vach'n̈ej ajec' ved'oc, yujto ix in naeli to uujn̈ej ay svach'c'olal Jehová d'a vib'an̈.
28: Al d'ayin jantac val tzach in tupu', xchi vin̈aj Labán chi'.
29: <pb/>Ix yalanxi vin̈aj Jacob chi': <pb/>—Ojtac val tas ix aj in munlaj ed'oc yed' tas ix aj vilan noc' a molb'etzal noc' tic.
30: Ojtac to jayvan̈n̈ej noc' a molb'etzal noc' tic ayic in janac, axo ticnaic toxo ix q'uib' sb'isul noc'. Atax val yic in janac chi' syamannacoch Jehová yac'an svach'c'olal d'a ib'an̈. Axo ticnaic, ¿b'aq'uin̈ ol in chael yich vilan vic yed' eb' ix vetb'eyum tic yed' eb' vuninal? xchi vin̈.
31: <pb/>—¿Jantac a tojol tza c'ana'? xchi vin̈aj Labán chi'. <pb/>—Malajocab' in tojol tzac'a', an̈ejto svil jab'ocxo noc' a calnel tic, tato ol scha a c'ol tas ol vala'.
32: Cha in och d'a scal noc' a calnel yed' noc' a chiva ticnaic, yic tzin sic'anel masanil noc' tz'ib'iltac, noc' jasquiltac stz'ib'ul, noc' yunetac q'uiq'uic'. A noc' chi' ol och in tojoloc.
33: Yuj chi' jun, ayic tzach c'och il noc' a noc' chi', noc' svic' in tojoloc chi', icha chi' ol aj ilancot in tojolal. Tato a d'a scal noc' vic chi' ay noc' chiva, ma noc' calnel chi' man̈ tz'ib'iltacoc, mato man̈ q'uiq'uic'oc, van ach velc'an syal chi', xchi vin̈.
34: <pb/>—Vach'ocab'i. Scha in c'ol tas tzal chi', xchi vin̈aj Labán chi'.
35: <pb/>An̈ejtona' d'a jun c'ual chi' ix sic'anel masanil noc' mam chiva tz'ib'iltac vin̈aj Labán chi' yed' noc' jasquiltac stz'ib'ul, noc' nun chiva soman jab'oc saquil yed' masanil noc' calnel q'uiq'uic' yilji, ix yac'an noc' vin̈ d'a eb' yuninal.
36: Ix yic'anb'at noc' eb' yuninal vin̈ chi' d'a najat, oxe' c'ual stec'nab'il b'aj ix can vin̈aj Jacob chi'. Ix cann̈ej vin̈ stan̈vej juntzan̈xo noc' scalnel vin̈aj Labán chi'.
37: <pb/>Elan̈chamel ix sna vin̈aj Jacob chi', ix stzepel sc'ab'tac te te' scuch álamo vin̈, te' almendro yed' te' castaño. Tz'ib'iltac ix yutej te' vin̈ sjosan stz'umal. Ay sac yed' q'uiq'uic' ix aj yilji te' yuj vin̈.
38: Ix yac'anoch juntzan̈ te' c'ab'tac te' chi' vin̈ d'a yichan̈ noc' calnel chi', b'aj syuc'a' noc', aton ta' stajni noc'. D'a yichan̈ noc' aypaxoch te te' tz'ib'iltac yilji chi', yuj chi' ayic tz'aj yune' noc', tz'ib'iltac yilji yune' noc' chi'.
40: A masanil noc' tz'ib'iltac tz'aj chi', ix sic'canel noc' vin̈ d'a scal noc' yic vin̈aj Labán chi'. Icha chi' ix yutej vin̈ sic'anel noc' scalnel chi' d'a scal noc' yic vin̈aj Labán chi'.
41: Masanil noc' te vach', ayic stajni noc', syac'anoch te te' vin̈aj Jacob chi' d'a yichan̈ noc' b'aj xid'ec' noc' yuc'a', yic vach' syil te te' chi' noc' ayic stajni noc' chi'.
42: Axo yic sjavi noc' yatac val ay, max yaq'uem te te' chi' vin̈ d'a yichan̈ noc'. Yuj chi', a noc' tz'ontac yic vin̈aj Labán chi', axo noc' vach' yic vin̈aj Jacob chi'.
43: Icha chi' ix aj yoch vin̈aj Jacob chi' b'eyumal. Man̈ jantacoc noc' svacax vin̈, noc' scalnel vin̈ yed' noc' schiva vin̈. Man̈ jantacoc noc' scamello vin̈ yed' noc' sb'uru vin̈ yed' pax eb' vin̈ schecab' vin̈ yed' eb' ix schecab' vin̈.
